metadata.synopsis: Player clicks on forge, and notes that there is a place for a mould to fit. If they have found one of the keys already, they remark that that particular object will fit.
metadata.how_to_trigger: go to -558; -4; 233Click on the mould chamber

0.speaker: Player
0.text: An opening in the metal. That mould should fit perfectly.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Something's missing. I'll need a mould to get this thing running.
